data.text: @KenyaAirways Why aren't you going to pick up the students in Ukraine is there anyway I can pay  for airplane to go get these people
@KenyaAirways Hello, whats problem with your cargo software , agents can't place bookings from Turkey ?
@KenyaAirways Go back to be the Pride of Africa

@KenyaAirways while everything you do is okay, your pricing strategy is fundamentally flawed. For instance, why wud KQ charge 10k one way to Kisumu while the others charge 4k? What is so premium about KQ that warrants these fees. In my humble submission, your pricing strategy is the problem
@KenyaAirways I pray you recover soon KQ.
